sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; interface Formation { etablissement: string; nbClasses: string; progression: number; pourcentage: number; } interface RegionFormation { name: string; total: string; formations: Formation[]; } @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.scss'] }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit { selectedCycle: string = '1'; selectedFormation: string = '1'; regions: RegionFormation[] = [ { name: 'COME', total: '45/45', formations: [ { etablissement: 'CEG 2 COME', nbClasses: '12/12', progression: 100, pourcentage: 100 }, { etablissement: 'CEG 4 COME', nbClasses: '11/11', progression: 100, pourcentage: 100 }, { etablissement: 'CEG AKODEHA', nbClasses: '22/22', progression: 100, pourcentage: 100 } ] }, { name: 'BANTÉ', total: '10/16', formations: [ { etablissement: 'CEG 1 BANTÉ', nbClasses: '2/6', progression: 20, pourcentage: 20 }, { etablissement: 'CEG AKPASSI', nbClasses: '2/4', progression: 50, pourcentage: 50 }, { etablissement: 'CEG ANOUDE', nbClasses: '6/6', progression: 100, pourcentage: 100 } ] } // Add other regions here ]; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } getProgressBarClass(percentage: number): string { if (percentage >= 100) return 'bg-green-500'; if (percentage >= 50) return 'bg-yellow-500'; return 'bg-red-500'; } }
